applicationConfirm.submittedForProperty: Short term registry application submitted for the following property:

propertyManager.title: Step 1 - Property Manager Information
propertyManager.subtitle: If there is a property manager business for this short-term rental unit, provide the contact information below.
propertyManager.propertyManagerRadioLegend: Do you have a property manager who manages this rental unit on your behalf?
propertyManager.propertyHostRoleOption: Property host (I'm registering my personal short-term rental unit)
propertyManager.propertyManagerRoleOption: Property manager (I'm registering a short-term rental unit on behalf of a client)

propertyManagerForm.warning: Email will be default method of communication. Information sent via email will be considered "received" on the third day after the email is sent.

contact.title: Step 2 - Host Information
contact.subtitle: Provide the contact information of the property host.
contact.backupContactInfoDescription: This is a back-up contact person in case other contacts cannot be reached.
contact.individualOrBusinessQuestion: Is the short-term rental unit hosted by an individual or a business?
contact.disclaimer: This is your legal name as it appears on your BC Services Card.

contactForm.warning: Email will be default method of communication. Information sent via email will be considered "received" on the third day after the email is sent.

propertyForm.subtitle: Rental Unit Information
propertyForm.nicknameHelp: This is only to help you identify your rental unit, especially if you manage multiple properties (e.g., My Guest Suite)
propertyForm.parcelIdentifierHelp: This is a nine-digit number that identifies the parcel in the land title of your property.
propertyForm.parcelIdentifierTooltip: You can find your Parcel Identifier (PID) on your Property Assessment Notice from BC Assessment. Alternatively, visit the BC Assessment website, search for your civic address, and look for the PID under 'Legal Description and Parcel ID'.
propertyForm.businessLicenseHelp: This is the business licence to operate a short-term rental as provided by your local government.
propertyForm.businessLicenseExpiryDateHelp: Enter the Business Licence Expiry Date (YYYY-MM-DD)
propertyForm.rentalUnitSpaceType: What type of space is offered in this rental unit?
propertyForm.entireHome: Entire home (guests have the entire place to themselves)
propertyForm.sharedAccommodation: Shared accommodation (guests rent a bedroom with access to common spaces)
propertyForm.webLinkInfo: Add the web link for your listing on a short-term rental platform (e.g., airbnb.ca/your_listing123). You can add multiple links if this rental unit is listed on multiple platforms (e.g., Airbnb, VRBO, Expedia, etc.).
propertyForm.multiUnitHousing: Small scale, multi-unit housing (e.g., duplex, triplex)
propertyForm.isUnitOnPrincipalResidenceProperty: Is the rental unit on the same property as the principal residence?
propertyForm.hostResidence: Where does the property host live on the property?
propertyForm.hostResidenceRequiredError: Please specify where the host lives on the property
propertyForm.sameUnitOption: The host lives in this unit
propertyForm.sameUnitAltOption: The host lives in this unit when it's not being rented
propertyForm.anotherUnitOption: The host lives in another unit on the same property
propertyForm.numberOfRoomsForRentHelp: Enter the number of rooms available for rent in this unit
propertyForm.principalResidenceRequired: Please select if the rental unit is on the same property as the principal residence.
propertyForm.numberOfRoomsForRentRequired: Please specify the number of rooms available for rent
propertyForm.numberOfRoomsForRentMaxExceeded: The maximum allowed number of rooms for rent is 5000

principalResidence.provincialRules: Provincial rules limit the operation of short-term rentals in BC to
principalResidence.provincialRulesContinued: or a secondary suite on the same property.
principalResidence.radioLegend: My property is in a community where the principal residence applies
principalResidence.reasonHint: Please enter the reason why the principal residence requirement does not apply to this property
principalResidence.serviceHint: Please specify the type of accommodation service provider
principalResidence.requiredDocs: Please submit required documentation that confirms that the property being registered is a principal residence.
principalResidence.uploadMultiple: Upload one or more supporting documents
principalResidence.fileRequirements: File must be a .pdf. Maximum file size is 50 MB.
principalResidence.declare:
As required by section 14 (2) of the Short-Term Accommodations Rental Act (the Act), I declare the property host will comply with the principal residence restriction in the Act and provide the short-term rental accommodation services described in this registration in one or both of: 
 a. the property host’s principal residence, 
 b.not more than one secondary suite or other accessory dwelling unit that is on the land parcel associated with the property host's principal residence. 
 I understand that if the property host does not comply with the requirement to provide the short-term rental accommodation services in the principal residence, I may be subject to enforcement action under Part 4 of the Act, including being ordered to pay an administrative penalty.
principalResidence.consent: I consent to the Ministry of Finance sharing data and information about me with the Short-Term Rental Branch. I understand the information will be shared to confirm that the property being registered is my principal residence or a secondary suite or accessory dwelling unit on the same land parcel as my principal residence. If you provide consent, it may speed our review and approval of your registration.
principalResidence.no: No, principal residence does not apply or my property is exempt
principalResidence.yes: Yes, my property has a principal residence requirement
principalResidence.institution: Educational institution accommodation (Student or Employee) (off campus)
principalResidence.fileSizeError: File must be less than 50MB in size
principalResidence.fileTypeError: File must be of type pdf

review.reviewInstructions: Please review all of the information entered below.
review.reviewInstructionsContinued: Please note that some information in this application can not be changed once the form has been submitted.
review.declarationPartOne: As required by section 14 (2) of the Short-Term Accommodations Rental Act (the Act), I declare the property host will comply with the principal residence restriction in the Act and provide the short-term rental accommodation services described in this registration in one or both of:
review.declarationB: not more than one secondary suite or other accessory dwelling unit that is on the land parcel associated with the property host's principal residence.
review.declarationPartTwo: I understand that if the property host does not comply with the requirement to provide the short-term rental accommodation services in the principal residence, I may be subject to enforcement action under Part 4 of the Act, including being ordered to pay an administrative penalty.
review.confirm: I confirm that the information contained in the application for registration is accurate and true. I understand that, if I have provided inaccurate or false information, I may be the subject of enforcement action under Part 4 of the Short-Term Rental Accommodations Act. Enforcement action may include being ordered to pay an administrative penalty.
review.confirmHostAuthorization: I am authorized by the property host to act as the supplier host and to submit this short-term rental listing on their behalf, making all required declarations as per Section 6 of the Short-Term Rental Accommodations Act, and ensuring compliance with all applicable provisions of the Act.
review.SAME_UNIT: The host lives in this unit
review.ANOTHER_UNIT: The host lives in another unit on the same property

details.title: Step 3 - Add Your Short Term Rental Property Details
details.subtitle: Tell us more about the property you plan to offer for short-term rental. If you have other properties you want to register and offer as short-term rentals, we will ask you about them later.
